data.actual_result: The channel is listed, and when selecting it it says "Success". On the Desktop app the channel isn't even listed
data.expected_result: The channel the user is already in shouldn't be listed, or at least the operation should fail
data.short_description: Can move a user in the same voice channel he's already in (not possible on Desktop)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have move permissions in a server - Have a user (or yourself) join a VC - Open voice channel menu and find the administration options - Move To...  - Notice the current channel the user is in is listed. Tap on it
